Class Server

java.lang.Object
org.serverside.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Server extends Object implements Runnable
Server inspired by server of "Simple TCP Chat Room in Java" by NeuralNine

    • broadcastToAllExcept

      public void broadcastToAllExcept(Server.ConnectionHandler exception, String message)
      This will send a message to all clients connected excepted the one given
      Parameters:
      exception - client not concerned by broadcast
      message - message to be sent

    • broadcastToAllExcept

      message - message to be sent
